subject: Boxing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Aragon, the lightweight and welterweight boxing contender of the 1950s, was known as Golden Boy for his flamboyant ring presence and love for the Hollywood life.
snippet: Mr. Aragon, the lightweight and welterweight boxing contender of the 1950s, was known as Golden Boy for his flamboyant ring presence and love for the Hollywood life.
